author: Reuters
title: Japan's Mizuho reports ATM glitch in latest tech trouble - Reuters
description: Mizuho Financial Group's (8411.T) main banking unit said its automated teller machines (ATMs) in some parts of Japan were hit by a system glitch on Monday.
content:
TOKYO, Aug 23 (Reuters) - Mizuho Financial Group's (8411.T) main banking unit said its automated teller machines (ATMs) in some parts of Japan were hit by a system glitch on Monday.

author: Reuters
title: Qatar's Commercial Bank raises $875 mln loan - Reuters
description: Qatar's Commercial Bank (COMB.QA) has borrowed $875 million to refinance existing debt and support general funding requirements, it said in a stock exchange filing on Monday.
content: DUBAI, Aug 23 (Reuters) - Qatar's Commercial Bank (COMB.QA) has borrowed $875 million to refinance existing debt and support general funding requirements, it said in a stock exchange filing on Monday… [+350 chars]

author: Aniruddha Ghosh
title: Wall Street analysts bet on Robinhood's potential to add users - Reuters
description: Wall Street analysts on Monday took a largely upbeat view on Robinhood Markets Inc in their first ratings on the stock as they bet on the online brokerage's ability to boost its user base, days after it warned of easing retail trading frenzy.
